name: 阿里安娜·斯科特
name_full: 阿里安娜·斯科特 Arianna Scott
introduction: Arianna Scott was born and raised in Denver, CO. Growing up she was always taught to be proud of who she is and her ancestors, whose shoulders she stands on to this very day. Her confidence stems from this foundation. Her creativity was realized at a young age when she was cast in the lead role as Dorothy in The Wiz and continued on to perform as MiMi in RENT, The Musical (twice!).
